LanguageData.BuckShot.label: buckshot
LanguageData.BuckShot.description: Filled with several buckshot pellets which spread in a tight pattern.
LanguageData.BirdShot.label: birdshot
LanguageData.BirdShot.description: Filled with a large number of very small birdshot pellets which spread over a large area.
LanguageData.Slug.label: slug
LanguageData.Slug.description: The single large projectile offers better damage potential and armor penetration compared to regular shot but is inaccurate over large distances.
LanguageData.Beanbag.label: beanbag
LanguageData.Beanbag.description: Non-lethal rubber round originally designed for riot control. Accurate over short ranges only. Designed to temporarily incapacitate a target, it does not cause bleeding or damage to internal organs.
LanguageData.ElectroSlug.label: EMP
LanguageData.ElectroSlug.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the projectile is accurate over short range only and delivers an electro-magnetic pulse on impact, temporarily disabling electronics.
